headline.main: Aerosol Can Controversy: Effects Are Filtering Down to the Beauty Salon

docs.abstract: article examines controversy surrounding use of fluorocarbons in aerosol spray containers and precautionary measures to halt their use (L)
docs.lead_paragraph: Lourdes Riera paused during a recent shopping trip to a Coral Gables, Fla., supermarket to discuss a product that has aroused concern across the country: the aerosol can.
docs.snippet: Lourdes Riera paused during a recent shopping trip to a Coral Gables, Fla., supermarket to discuss a product that has aroused concern across the country: the aerosol can.
